title: Post Game: Biden weathers an economic storm, with Peter Alexander
description: As gas prices spike and the Dow Jones tumbles, President Biden struggles with plummeting approvals on inflation and economic concerns. NBC News Chief White House Correspondent Peter Alexander joins Chuck to break down the administration's response to a worsening domestic crisis.
author: nbcnews.podcasts@gmail.com (NBC News)
